verses.verse: And you has he quickened, who were <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> and <S%G266>sins;<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> in <S%G4218>time<s%> past you <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G165>course<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G109>air,<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> in the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience:<s%>

<S%G1722>Among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G3956>all<s%> had our <S%G390>conversation<s%> in <S%G4218>times<s%> past in the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of our <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G4160>fulfilling<s%> the <S%G2307>desires<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and of the <S%G1271>mind;<s%> and were by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G3062>others.<s%>
But <S%G2316>God,<s%> who is <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> for his <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> us,

<S%G2532>Even<s%> when we were <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>sins,<s%> has <S%G4806>quickened<s%> us <S%G4806>together<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> (by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you are <S%G4982>saved;<s%>)
And has <S%G4891>raised<s%> us up <S%G4891>together,<s%> and <S%G4776>made<s%> us <S%G4776>sit<s%> <S%G4776>together<s%> in <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

That in the <S%G165>ages<s%> to <S%G1904>come<s%> he might <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of his <S%G5485>grace<s%> in his <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> us <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For by <S%G5485>grace<s%> are you <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> and that not of <S%G5216>yourselves:<s%> it is the <S%G1435>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>
Not of <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man should <S%G2744>boast.<s%>

For we are his <S%G4161>workmanship,<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4282>before<s%> <S%G4282>ordained<s%> that we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> in them.

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G3421>remember,<s%> that you being in <S%G4218>time<s%> past <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G203>Uncircumcision<s%> by that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G4061>Circumcision<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5499>made<s%> by <S%G5499>hands;<s%>

That <S%G1722>at<s%> that <S%G2540>time<s%> you were <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> being <S%G526>aliens<s%> from the <S%G4174>commonwealth<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G3581>strangers<s%> from the <S%G1242>covenants<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> and <S%G112>without<s%> <S%G112>God<s%> in the <S%G2889>world:<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> you <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4218>sometimes<s%> were <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G3112>off<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For he is our <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> and has <S%G3089>broken<s%> down the <S%G3320>middle<s%> wall of <S%G5418>partition<s%> between us;

Having <S%G2673>abolished<s%> in his <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity,<s%> even the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>commandments<s%> contained in <S%G1378>ordinances;<s%> for to <S%G2936>make<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> so <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

And that he might <S%G604>reconcile<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> by the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> having <S%G615>slain<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G1722>thereby:<s%>
And <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to you <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G3112>afar<s%> off, and to them that were <S%G1451>near.<s%>
For <S%G1223>through<s%> him we <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> you are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> and <S%G3941>foreigners,<s%> but fellow <S%G4847>citizens<s%> with the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

And are <S%G2026>built<s%> on the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G848>himself<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G204>chief<s%> <S%G204>corner<s%> stone;

In <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3619>building<s%> <S%G4883>fitly<s%> <S%G4883>framed<s%> <S%G4883>together<s%> <S%G837>grows<s%> to an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>
In <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G4925>built<s%> <S%G4925>together<s%> for an <S%G2732>habitation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
